dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Net Result
dmca.body:
NR NetResult
Intellectual Property Protection
Mulberry House 
583 Fulham Road 
London
SWG 5UA
Tel: 020 7471 1733 

Dear Sir,

Please see the DMCA compliant Cease and Desist below that refers to the site http://live-cricket-world.blogspot.com that clearly is offering illegal links to streams of the 2007 Cricket World Cup. Please see this in conjunction Re: [#l2734378] and the previous email that I have sent regarding this particular site. 

Regards, 

Mike Kiernan 

GCC: ICC Cricket World Cup 2007 infringements- ICC_NRID14279

NetResult Internal Reference: ICC_NRID14279

Please quote the above ICC_NR1D14279 reference in all communications with us regarding this issue. 

Dear Sirs.

We write on behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited who together own and control the worldwide broadcast rights for the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007. 

We have noticed that your website, http://live-cricket-world.blogspot.com/ is displaying, promoting and/or offering audio, visual and/or audio-visual content from the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007. All copyright in such images vest with ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited.
 
As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from the ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited to use this content, your present use is an infringement of the ICC Development (International) Limited
dmca.principal_name: ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited
